channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: German Bunds Shrug Off Government's Collapse
item.description: Bund yields rose early in the European session, as traders shrugged off the collapse of Germany’s coalition government due to disagreements over econo...

item.title: ‘I feel we’ve failed’: My son wants me to take out a $150,000 student loan so he can attend an out-of-state college. Is that fair?
item.description: “We are not eligible for any need-based aid.”

item.title: U.S. stocks staged an epic rally after Trump won the election. What history says could happen before year-end.
item.description: Historically, stocks have tended to rise in the postelection period — and market analysts say they still have the potential to keep climbing through t...

item.title: Gold Prices Remain Favorable in Short-To-Medium Term
item.description: Spot gold was higher and XS.com said the precious metal remains favorable in the short-to-medium term, especially if low-interest-rate conditions pers...

item.title: ‘It strikes me as vengeful’: My friend wants to boycott a coffee shop because of the owner’s political views. Is this what America has become?
item.description: “There was a pile-on of hate and jubilance at the thought of putting this man out of business.”

item.title: Bitcoin Eases From Record High After U.S. Election
item.description: Bitcoin eased back from its record high but Zaye Capital Markets said Trump’s potentially inflationary policies, the Fed’s rate cut cycle and increasi...

item.title: Former ‘Real Housewives’ star Dorinda Medley shows off her lavish Gilded Age property
item.description: Medley is opening the doors to her palatial Berkshires estate, which has been gloriously redesigned.

item.title: Trump Tax Cuts Come at the Right Time for Stocks. Further Ahead, It Gets Murky.
item.description: Lower taxes would be a boon for an equity market that was starting to look priced for perfection, but tariffs could create longer-term damage.

item.title: European Defense Stocks Face Volatility Amid Unclear U.S. Foreign Policy
item.description: European defense stocks should brace for price volatility in the coming months until Europe gets a clearer idea of Donald Trump’s foreign policy, Citi...

item.title: Rosie O’Donnell’s former Star Island home goes on the market for $54 million
item.description: The comedian’s former Miami mansion is listed two decades after she sold the home for less than a third of that price.
